dlgLine.text: [NORMAL START] Oh, hello, <charname>! What can I do for you?

dlgAnsw.text: [N Upgrade] Is there anything you think would make things better around here?
[N Luxury Need] Is there anything you'd like me to look for out in the field?
[N Luxury Get] I found those chocolates for you.
[N Questions] I had a couple questions for you.
Ah, never mind for now.

dlgLine.text: [N BASE] What can I do for you?

dlgAnsw.text: [N Upgrade] Is there anything you think would make things better around here?
[N Luxury Need] Is there anything you'd like me to look for out in the field?
[N Luxury Get] I found those chocolates for you.
[N Questions] I had a couple questions for you.
Ah, never mind for now.

dlgLine.text: [N UPGRADE] Well, when I was little, my dad used to take me to the gun range to shoot. He said I always needed to be ready to protect myself, and when we were there, he'd seem happier... so oh! Sorry for rambling! I think having a gun range would be lovely, thank you!

dlgAnsw.text: [N BASE] Shooting range... I'll look into it. There was something else...
I'll remember that. Bye for now.

dlgLine.text: [N LUXURY NEED] Goodness! Something special? Well... I can't help it, but I have an awful sweet tooth. I know it's not exactly the easiest thing to find in hot Texas weather, but a box of chocolates - not a boring supermarket bar, but something expensive - I would just die for some of those!

dlgAnsw.text: [N BASE] Fancy chocolates? You got it. There was something else...
I'll remember that. Bye for now.

dlgLine.text: [N LUXURY GET] Oh my goodness, these are wonderful! I can't believe you got them for me - how amazing! You're just the very best, <charname>, thank you so much!

dlgAnsw.text: [N BASE] Glad you like them. There was something else...
You go ahead and enjoy them - we'll talk more later.

dlgLine.text: [N QUESTIONS] Ask anything you like!

dlgAnsw.text: [Background] Tell me about yourself.
[Skills] What would you say your skills are?
Actually, let's talk later. Bye.

dlgLine.text: [BACKGROUND] <Fiona giggles coquettishly.> That's kind of personal! But I suppose I can give you the basics. I was born in Shreveport, Louisiana, but I moved around a lot as a child since my father was in the army. A decorated veteran, even!

We settled down at the Brady military base - not far from here - and I lived there until I graduated high school. My father worked hard to help me learn to defend myself, and I learned from my mother how to "be a lady," just as she was taught back in Shreveport.

My mother was so gorgeous. And my daddy just loved her - you'd think she taught the sun to shine, the way he carried on! Sadly, she left us when I was only nine, and Pa was even so broken up from her death six years later that he shot himself. I took care of him until he... died... when I was eighteen.

After that I moved to just outside Austin, and got an associates degree... which I suppose is not very important unless you need some clerical work done! <She laughs shyly.> That's my story. Not the most exciting, but it's me!

dlgAnsw.text: [N BASE] Oh, there was something else I wanted to ask you...
That's all right. We'll talk later.

dlgLine.text: [SKILLS] Now, my father was very clear that I learn to protect myself, so when I was growing up, I learned how to shoot, and even took self-defense courses! He made sure I knew how to get out of a thicket of woods and back home, and how to change a tire and set a broken bone.

<She sighs wistfully.> I don't think my father would have ever imagined - or wanted to imagine - I would ever have to endure in these kind of conditions, but I sure wish he was alive for me to thank him.

dlgAnsw.text: [N BASE] Oh, there was something else I wanted to ask you...
He sounds like he was a thorough guy. We'll talk more later.

dlgLine.text: [SHUTDOWN START] <Fiona looks at you sidelong, then looks away sullenly. Her response hardly sounds like a question.> ...Yes?

dlgAnsw.text: [Snapout] Look. I said what I did so that you'd be your own person, not to push you into this depression.
[S Questions] I had a couple questions for you.
You know what? Forget it.

dlgLine.text: [S QUESTIONS] <Fiona looks away sullenly.> Pardon me, but I don't feel like talking.

dlgAnsw.text: [Snapout] Look, let's have this out. All right?
You know what? Forget it.

dlgLine.text: [SNAPOUT] <Fiona looks at you, her eyes accusing, and says nothing.>

dlgAnsw.text: [Forgive] Look. I need allies, not servants. That's no good to me, and it's no good framing yourself that way.
[Forgive] Fiona, you need to be your own person. You can't just try to be who you think others want.
All right, you're obviously not willing to talk about this. Guess we'll pick this up another time.
[Exile] You know what? I am honestly sick of your bullshit. If you can't handle being your own person, get the fuck out.

dlgLine.text: [FORGIVE] I... <Fiona shuts her eyes tight, and when she looks at you again a little bit of the coldness is gone.> All right. But I still... you're not who I thought you were.

dlgAnsw.text: Nobody is anymore, Fiona. Start getting over it, and trying to figure yourself out.

dlgLine.text: [EXILE] <Fiona looks at you in fright.> No... you wouldn't...

dlgAnsw.text: Fine, forget it. But think about improving your goddamn attitude.
[Boot] I fucking am. So get out that door before I shoot you.

dlgLine.text: [BOOT] <Fiona stares at you one last time, terrified, then turns and runs out of the Shelter, never to return.>

dlgAnsw.text: So much for her.

dlgLine.text: [FORGIVE START] What?

dlgAnsw.text: [F Upgrade] Is there anything you think would make things better around here?
[F Luxury Need] Is there anything you'd like me to look for out in the field?
[F Luxury Get] I found those chocolates for you.
[F Questions] I had a couple questions for you.
You know what? Forget it.

dlgLine.text: [F UPGRADE] <Fiona thinks a minute, then nods.> Gun range. Please.

dlgAnsw.text: [Forgive Start] Gun range - got it. There was something else...
Right. Talk to you later.

dlgLine.text: [F LUXURY NEED] <Fiona shrugs.> Chocolate's good. Not bars, the type in boxes. The nice ones.

dlgAnsw.text: [Forgive Start] Right, fancy chocolates. There was something else...
Right. Talk to you later.

dlgLine.text: [F LUXURY GET] <Fiona's eyes widen in surprise.> I... I didn't think you'd actually... these look good! Um. <She looks conflicted, then returns to a quieter sullenness.> Thank you.

dlgAnsw.text: [Forgive Start] Right... I had something else to ask.
Guess that's the best thanks I can expect... later.

dlgLine.text: [F QUESTIONS] <Fiona looks away, her face flat.> I don't feel like answering anything about myself.

dlgAnsw.text: [Forgive Start] All right... how about something else?
All right, be that way.

dlgLine.text: [PRISON] <charname>! I knew you'd come to see me. <Fiona smiles playfully, her face almost innocent.>

dlgAnsw.text: [Doug] Why'd you kill Doug?
[Elaine Fighter] Why'd you kill Elaine?
[Elaine Counselor] Why'd you kill Elaine?
[Darlene] Why'd you kill Darlene?
[Troy] Why'd you kill Troy?
[Confess] You fucking murderer. I don't have any sweet words for you.
[Survive] I'm only keeping you in here because it's the just thing to do.
I only came down here to see if you were dead yet. Too bad.

dlgLine.text: [SURVIVAL] Oh, I understand! For right now, you have to play sweet to the people, but soon you'll see they mean nothing, and we can be together!

dlgAnsw.text: Lines like that make me reconsider killing you, lady. Fuck off.
You're a deluded murderer. Goodbye.

dlgLine.text: [DOUG] It's just like I said! He was plotting against you, I know it. He always challenged your authority, always stalked your footsteps. I know that if I hadn't stopped him, he'd have plunged a knife into your back!

dlgAnsw.text: [Confess] Doug was an internet troll! He was all noise and no danger - a paper knife! And you killed him for nothing!
[Confess] You're insane.

dlgLine.text: [ELAINE FIGHTER] That woman... that sweetness was such a vicious act. I know it. I could see it in her eyes!

How obsessively she worked on improving her combat skills... how ruthless she could be! A lioness sharpening her claws! She was just testing herself until the day - the day she could take you down and run this place herself!

dlgAnsw.text: [Confess] Elaine barely survived the plane crash. She was going to kill herself, and I talked her out of it. And you murdered her for nothing!
[Confess] You're insane.

dlgLine.text: [ELAINE COUNSELOR] That woman... that sweetness was such a vicious act. I know it. I could see it in her eyes!

A "counselor" - ha! She was a manipulator, getting everyone's trust, harvesting their secrets. Storing them until she could threaten them the most effectively, twisting the gullible ones to her side until she could turn them against you and take over!

dlgAnsw.text: [Confess] Elaine barely survived the plane crash. She was going to kill herself, and I talked her out of it. And you murdered her for nothing!
[Confess] You're insane.

dlgLine.text: [DARLENE] She was a wild dog! She followed a different master here - how could you think she had any loyalty left for you? Her heart was set on another leader, and I know the second she thought she could tip the scales, she'd put an arrow through your neck!

dlgAnsw.text: [Confess] Darlene came here because she trusted me, not just Ford. And you killed her for what, jealousy?!
[Confess] You're insane.

dlgLine.text: [TROY] That redneck survivalist - his loyalties lay with the militia, not with us! He was just using us, trying to get your trust, acting as a spy for his buddies! A wild grub like that wants to be running through the woods with mud on his face like a child, not in here attempting to be civilized!

dlgAnsw.text: [Confess] Troy was a ratty twentysomething who talked big but was really a scared kid. You killed him for no reason.
[Confess] You're insane.

dlgLine.text: [CONFESS] But don't you see? I did this for you! For us! I told you there was danger here, and that I'd do anything to protect you from it. And I have, I have! I saved you, and I'd do it again, and again!

My father, he loved my mother more than anything. She left us, and he fell apart, because she was his whole life. He didn't fight hard enough for her, he didn't tell her! But he told me. He told me, and I learned!

When he found out she died, he tried to kill himself and failed, and I had to take care of him until I turned 18. But I learned my lesson well! I had to find the one for me, and be perfect for them. I helped him sleep for the last time so I could take on his last, most important lesson!

But I learned from him. I gave him the rest he needed to show him I was ready! I knew... once you find someone special, someone who really stands out, you stay with them. And you do anything for them. Even kill.

dlgAnsw.text: [Kill] You killed - for me? Then here's my thanks. <Shoot her>
[Exile] You know what? I think the worst thing I could do is kick you out of here.
[Dismiss] You're insane. But I'm going to stick to what I decided. You're going to stay here until your sentence is complete.

dlgLine.text: [KILL] <The bullet shatters her skull, but a remnant of Fiona's final playful smile lingers ghoulishly on her face.>

dlgAnsw.text: Good fucking riddance.

dlgLine.text: [EXILE] <Fiona looks panicked.> No... no! I can't! I'd rather die - I could go knowing I did the right thing for you! Please don't drive me away, I'll do anything! I just want to protect you, you're my world! You're everything to me! Please, I beg you, <charname>, please!

dlgAnsw.text: [Kill] Fuck it. <Shoot her.>
[Dismiss] Fine. I'll keep to my earlier decision. But you're going to stay here until your sentence is complete.
I've made my decision. Enjoy a life alone. A short one.

dlgLine.text: [DISMISS] I understand. I'll be here waiting for when you come back to me, and we can escape together!

dlgAnsw.text: <You shake your head and end the conversation.>
